mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(dept_id, user_name, nick_name, email, phonenumber, sex, status, create_by, create_time, remark, password) values(#{deptId},#{password},#{userName},#{nickName},#{email},#{phonenumber},#{sex},#{status},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{remark});
mapper.select:
select user_id, dept_id, user_name, nick_name, user_type, email, phonenumber, sex, avatar, password, status, del_flag, login_ip, login_date, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_user where user_type ="00" user_name like concat("%",#{userName},"%") and phonenumber = #{phonenumber} and status = #{status} and dept_id = #{deptId} and create_time between #{begin} and #{end}
order by create_time desc
